Package weka.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NamedTask
    Extension of the Task interface for tasks with a name/ID.
    Scheduled
    Interface to something that uses a schedule.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddSlaveServlet
    Registers a slave server with this Weka server instance.
    ExecuteTaskServlet
    Accepts a task for execution.
    GetScheduleServlet
    Returns the schedule associated with a task.
    GetServerLoadServlet
    Returns the load of this Weka server instance.
    GetTaskListServlet
    Returns a list of tasks registered with this Weka server instance.
    GetTaskResultServlet
    Get the result of a task (if available).
    GetTaskStatusServlet
    Get the status of a task.
    JSONProtocol
    Routines for encoding/decoding data to/from JSON
    Legacy
    Binary/legacy related task stuff.
    PurgeTaskServlet
    Purge one or more tasks from the server.
    RootServlet
    The main servlet.
    Schedule
    Class for configuring a recurring or one-off schedule.
    SetLastExecutionServlet
    Used by slaves to pass back execution date-time information for tasks to their master.
    SetTaskStatusServlet
    Used by slaves to pass back task status info to their master
    WekaServer
    The main server program that launches tasks (either locally or on registered remote slaves).
    WekaServer.ConnectionManager
    Provides singleton access to the Apache commons HTTP connection manager.
    WekaServlet
    Base class for Weka servlets.
    WekaTaskMap
    Class that maintains a map of tasks for execution.
    WekaTaskMap.NamedClassDelegator
    Wrapper NamedTask that delegates to the task it wraps around.
    WekaTaskMap.SimpleNamedTask
    Simple wrapper that wraps a NamedTask interface around a Task.
    WekaTaskMap.WekaTaskEntry
    Information about a task.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Schedule.OccurrenceWithinMonth  
    Schedule.Repeat
